title: Deer-Stalking in the Adirondacks in Winter, from Every Saturday, January 21, 1871, p. 57
medium: Wood engraving on off-white wove paper
description: Horizontal view of a clear space in woods, with two men in foreground, centre and left centre, wearing snow-shoes and carrying rifles, moving toward antlered stag in middle distance, right, being attacked by dogs.
name: Print
